data_sources.description: Contains data on various Netflix titles including movies and TV shows.

data_variables.name: df
data_variables.description: Main DataFrame containing all data from the Netflix dataset.

data_variables.name: df_movie
data_variables.description: DataFrame filtered to include only movies.

data_variables.name: df_TVshow
data_variables.description: DataFrame filtered to include only TV shows.

data_flow.creation: Read from CSV file using pd.read_csv
data_flow.flow: Used for data profiling, cleaning, and filtering into df_movie and df_TVshow

data_flow.creation: Filtered from df where type is Movie
data_flow.flow: Used for visualizations of movie data and further analysis

data_flow.creation: Filtered from df where type is TV Show
data_flow.flow: Used for visualizations of TV show data and further analysis
